settings.text: Give your skin exactly what it needs for healthy, vibrant, and resilient skin you're proud to show off.

settings.newsletter_text: Get a free mini Hydrating Gel with your 1st purchase of $50 when you join our VIP List.

settings.title: You'll NEVER find any of the following in our goodies...
settings.content:
Parabens | Phthalates | Petrochemicals | PEGs | Silicones | Sulfates | DEAs + TEAs | Ethanol + Related Alcohols
Propylene Glycol | Phenoxyethanol | Synthetic Fragrance | Dyes + Color Additives

settings.title: The Highest Standards
settings.text:
Every single ingredient we use has the safest rating from the Environmental Working Group so you know you're doing right by your body and the environment.

Note: while we would love to be EWG Verified, that requires a significant investment that we can't afford as a small, indie brand. You can, however, look up each of our ingredients on the EWG's Skin Deep Database.

We love to geek out over cosmetic chemistry. If you have a question about the purpose, benefits, and/or safety rating of any ingredient, don't hesitate to send us a note.

settings.title: No Bad Science or Fear Mongering
settings.text:
We know that everything is a chemical. We know that pronounceability is a piss poor proxy for safety. We know that synthetic ingredients aren't inherently "bad" and natural ingredients aren't always "good."

We formulate with modern cosmetic chemistry and ancient Ayurvedic herbalism to make safe and effective plant-based products that work. And we simply don't believe in fear mongering as a tool to sell our products.

settings.title: Have questions about Bright Body Baby?
settings.content: Rest easy knowing that our ingredient standards are the same across both Bright Body and Bright Body Baby. You can also find a full glossary of each + every ingredient used in our baby products here.

settings.title: Are your products really "clean" and "nontoxic"?
settings.subtitle:
Every one of the ingredients in Bright Body products has the Environmental Working Group's safest rating. Don't believe us? Look them up for yourself!

We vetted our partner products, including makeup and sunscreen, with the same scrutiny. To learn more about our ingredient standards, click here.

settings.title: Are your products cruelty-free and vegan?
settings.subtitle:
Yes and yes. We have never tested our products on animals and we never will. Bright Body products are 100% vegan.

The only products we stock that are not vegan are:

> Naked Goat Soap Co. soaps and lip products

> Laura's Botanicals lip balms

> The Manuka Honey Activator in our Custom Ayurvedic Face Mask Kits

settings.title: What is your refill program? How does it work?
settings.subtitle: We package our products in glass, aluminum, and cardboard containers. Products in glass & aluminum are eligible for our refill program. Products in kraft cardboard are recyclable and compostable after removing the label. To learn more, read here.

settings.title: How do you source your ingredients?
settings.subtitle: Each and every one of our suppliers was researched &vetted for ingredient purity, quality, and sound environmental practices. We purchase our raw materials from American companies only and use as many organic and fair trade ingredients as possible.

settings.title: Are your hair products color-safe?
settings.subtitle: Yes. Since Bright Body products are synthetic sulfate-free and pH balanced, they are safe for color-treated hair.

settings.title: What is the shelf life of your products? How can I keep them fresh?
settings.subtitle:
Proper preservation is of the utmost importance to us atBright Body, and we only use naturally-derived, organic acid preservatives with the Environmental Working Group's safest rating. Stored properly, Bright Body products will last 9-12 months once opened.

To ensure the best shelf life:

> Store out of direct sunlight Store at room temperature

> Do not introduce water into your containers

> For products packaged in jars, wash your hands before portioning product

settings.title: Are your products gluten-free?
settings.subtitle:
We use Bob’s Red Mill Organic Oats in several of our products -these oats are produced in a dedicated gluten-free facility and tested in their laboratory for the absence of gluten. However, we do not make our products in a certified gluten-free facility.

Our Clear Skin Potion is the only product containing any wheat derivatives -  it features azelaic acid, an ingredient derived from wheat, rye, and barley, and should not be used if you live with Celiac Disease.

settings.title: How does local pickup work?
settings.subtitle:
We are happy to offer local pickup at our shop located at3319 W Cary Street, Richmond, VA 23221.

To place an order for local pick up, simply go through the online shopping process as normal, and at checkout select "store pickup" under "delivery options."

Please wait until you receive an email notification that your order is ready before coming to pickup your product.

Watch the video linked in the pickup notification for instructions on where/when/how to pickup your order.

Pickup hours are:

Tuesday through Friday 11 to 6 Saturday 11 to 2

settings.title: How long will it take to receive my order?
settings.subtitle:
Since we make all Bright Body products by hand in small batches, we are currently allowing up to a 4 business day processing/lead time before products will be shipped to you. If for some reason we experience a delay in getting your order to you in that time frame, we will send an email notification.

Once the products ship, the shipping method you chose will determine how quickly packages drive to you, and you can keep track via your tracking number. All packages are shipped from Richmond, VA.

Once packages are shipped, we have access to the same tracking information as our customers.*please note: since the start of the COVID pandemic, shipping times are delayed across all carriers.

settings.title: Why do you ship some products on ice? Do I have to keep them cold?
settings.subtitle: We ship our meltable products in insulated bubble mailers on ice packs in order to keep them stable for shipping during warmer months.Because many of our products are made of whole, organic butters and oils, they are subject to melting during the shipping process. Once they arrive to you, you do NOT need to keep these products in the fridge - room temperature will do just fine!

settings.title: What is the Try It + Love It Guarantee?
settings.subtitle:
We're so confident that you'll love Bright Body products that we offer a Try It + Love It Guarantee for our mini sized products.

Try out any product in a mini size and if you don't love it in 30 days, contact us and you'll get your money back. If you're not happy with a full-sized Bright Body product, we offer store credit and exchanges.

Terms and Conditions

> Products must be purchased directly from mybrightbody.com, we do not accept returns from our retail partners.

> Original shipping charges are non-refundable. If you're returning a mini size through our Try it + Love it Guarantee, you do not need to return your product for a refund.

> If you would like to exchange a product (mini or otherwise), return shipping charges are the responsibility of the customer. Custom products and items marked final sale are non-returnable and non-refundable.

settings.title: What is your return & exchange policy?
settings.subtitle: For our full return + refund policy, click here.

settings.title: Benefits
settings.text:
Uplight & ease your mind. Our CBD infused teas reduce anxiety, stress and help your feel calm – without any psychoactive effects.

DOSAGE
Scoop 1/2 to 1 tsp and add it to 2 cups of hot water. 

INGREDIENTS

• 10mg natural hemp extract 🌿
• Blend of lavender, strawberry and peppermint

settings.title: Nontoxic
settings.text: Made with only EWG safest rated ingredients. No bad science.

settings.title: Refillable
settings.text: Zero waste refill pouch system. Save the planet + your wallet.

settings.title: Guaranteed
settings.text: We guarantee you'll love our mini sizes, or your money back.

settings.title: Cruelty Free
settings.text: Vegan ingredients + no testing on animals, ever.

settings.title: For Science-Minded & Eco-Conscious Clean Beauty Lovers
settings.content:
Our mission is to help science-minded and eco-conscious clean beauty lovers find proven products they love from a pro-science brand that gets it.

You know how frustrating it is when you spend hours researching a clean beauty product only to realize it has hidden crappy ingredients. Or worse, you find out the brand is using bad science and fear mongering to mediocre products.

Then there's the packaging - plastic containers really miss the point of clean beauty, no matter if it's "recyclable" or even "recycled." And let's just say the performance of most eco friendly beauty products needs work.

If you're ready to throw in the towel finding clean beauty you love thanks to bad science, fear mongering, or colossal plastic waste, we hear you. And we want you to know that there's a better way.

Bright Body will delight you with proven clean beauty you love. We make high-performing, nontoxic, and scientifically sound zero waste products that work better than any other clean or eco friendly products you've tried.

settings.title: Step 1
settings.text: For your first purchase, order your goodies in full packaging (glass jar or aluminum bottle).

settings.title: Step 2
settings.text:
When you're ready to buy again, order an aluminum refill pouch. It saves you a couple bucks and allows you to reuse your original packaging.

You can order refill pouches from the same product page as original packaging - no separate listings involved.

settings.title: Step 3
settings.text:
When your pouch arrives, empty its contents into your (cleaned & dried) original packaging.

Hang onto your empty pouches.

settings.title: Step 4
settings.text:
When you have 3 (or more) empty pouches on hand, let us know via checkout note on your next order.

We will include a kraft mailer and prepaid shipping label in your package.

Place your empty pouches inside the mailer and pop it in your mailbox!

settings.title: Step 5
settings.text: We receive your empty pouches and pop them in our Terracycle box just for this specific type of packaging.

settings.title: Shop Refills
settings.text: All our products are available in our closed loop refill pouch system.

settings.title: Terms & Conditions
settings.content:
Effective February 2020 we do not offer rebates on empty containers.

Effective May 2021 we do not accept empty containers.

Effective December 2021 we offer return shipping for customers with 3+ empty pouches.

settings.title: It All Started With Chronic Illness
settings.text:
Hi, I'm Gabi Day and I'm a science nerd who lives with multiple chronic illnesses - Lyme Disease, Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome, and POTS.

Back in one of my more severe flares (peep my hospital chic), I was looking for a way to give my immune system as much of a break as possible.

I started researching every personal care product I was using at the time and it didn't take long for me to realize that I could do way better and there's a lot of bad science out there in clean beauty.

settings.title: Science Nerd Forever
settings.text:
I figured it wouldn't be that hard to find a solid brand that used only the safest ingredients. I was very wrong.

As a true hard-headed and self-motivated Enneagram 8, I decided to create that line my damn self.

I started by teaching myself cosmetic chemistry while stuck in bed undergoing aggressive treatment.

As I slowly gained my strength back I started testing and learning product formulations in the kitchen.

My zone of genius is using botanical ingredients with the safest and best synthetics to make clean products that pack a punch.

settings.title: The Best Of Both Worlds
settings.text:
Since our 2017 launch, I've doubled down on a sustainable business model with our aluminum, glass, and kraft cardboard packaging PLUS a Refill Program in 2018.

I've also beefed up not only my cosmetic chemistry chops but also my study of yoga and Ayurveda (fun fact: I'm also an RYT-500 and Ayurvedic Health Coach).

Science is awesome. So is Ayurveda. It's possible to use BOTH.

settings.title: Then I Became A Twin Mom
settings.text:
After 3 years of unexplained infertility, 3 pregnancy losses, 6 IUIs, and 2 rounds of IVF, I got pregnant in August 2021.

Our single embryo transfer split into two, and in April 2022 my husband and I became parents to identical twin boys, Oscar & Nico.

While it's getting easier to find nontoxic-ish products for kids, many aren't as strict with their ingredients as I'd like, and almost all of them come in plastic packaging.

settings.title: So I Expanded The Line
settings.text:
So it was a logical next step for Bright Body to start making products for babies and kiddos, and decided to give it a bigger purpose...

When SCOTUS overturned Roe v. Wade in June 2022, I knew I had to do something to fight back.

As a mom by choice, for choice (who happened to have a life-saving abortion), I decided to harness the power of my small businesses. We are proud to donate 1% of our sales to pro-choice causes.

settings.title: Satisfaction guaranteed
settings.text: Try our minis and love them or get your money back.
